name: Le Mat Europe
memberOrga:
Le Mat Italy www.lemat.it
Le Mat Sweden www.lemat.se
goal: Le Mat Europe is a European social franchising organization and a social co-operative participated by a Swedish and an Italian cooperative. The organization is inspired to create jobs for vulnerable groups of persons mainly in the sustainable tourism branch by managing hotels, hostels and B&Bs or other facilities. A brand and handbooks were developed and the organization supports the development and start-up of new Le Mat special places.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Le Mat Europe follows directly the Social Entrepreneurship Initiatives, the development of social economy and the job creation for vulnerable groups.
